meta.title: Video Memorability Annotation Task
meta.description: Annotation task for Memorability on Videos
meta.disclaimer: This is a disclaimer. You are participating in this experiment voluntarily.

instructions.simple: A video player will be shown. When play is clicked, multiple 3 second videos will start playing one after the other. Your task is to try to detect which videos are repeated in the sequence. Press R when you see a repeat!
steps: Press the play button to start the video sequence
Press R when you see a repeated video.
If your accuracy is good, you will be able to advance to the next level!

hitCreation.title: Video Memorability Annotation Task
hitCreation.description: Indicate which videos you remember by playing a simple memory game on short 3 second videos!
